definition.name: Deploy to Kubernetes cluster
definition.description: Deploy to a Kubernetes cluster including, but not limited to Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) clusters
definition.author: azure

inputs.name: namespace
inputs.description: Choose the target Kubernetes namespace. If the namespace is not provided, the commands will automatically use the namespace defined in the manifest files first or otherwise run in the default namespace.

inputs.name: manifests
inputs.description: Path to the manifest files which will be used for deployment.

inputs.name: images
inputs.description: Fully qualified resource URL of the image(s) to be used for substitutions on the manifest files Example: contosodemo.azurecr.io/helloworld:test

inputs.name: imagepullsecrets
inputs.description: Name of a docker-registry secret that has already been set up within the cluster. Each of these secret names are added under imagePullSecrets field for the workloads found in the input manifest files

inputs.name: pull-images
inputs.description: Switch whether to pull the images from the registry before deployment to find out Dockerfile's path in order to add it to the annotations

inputs.name: strategy
inputs.description: Deployment strategy to be used. Allowed values are basic, canary and blue-green

inputs.name: route-method
inputs.description: Route based on service, ingress or SMI for blue-green strategy

inputs.name: version-switch-buffer
inputs.description: Indicates the buffer time in minutes before the switch is made to the green version (max is 300 min ie. 5hrs)

inputs.name: traffic-split-method
inputs.description: Traffic split method to be used. Allowed values are pod and smi

inputs.name: traffic-split-annotations
inputs.description: Annotations in the form of key/value pair to be added to TrafficSplit. Relevant only if deployement strategy is blue-green or canary

inputs.name: baseline-and-canary-replicas
inputs.description: Baseline and canary replicas count. Valid value between 0 to 100 (inclusive)

inputs.name: percentage
inputs.description: Percentage of traffic redirect to canary deployment

inputs.name: action
inputs.description: deploy, promote, or reject

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: Deploy when a previous deployment already exists. If true then --force argument is added to the apply command

inputs.name: server-side
inputs.description: The apply command runs in the server instead of the client. If true then --server-side argument is added to the apply command.

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.description: Timeout for the rollout status

inputs.name: token
inputs.description: Github token

inputs.name: annotate-resources
inputs.description: Annotate the resources. If set to false all annotations are skipped completely.

inputs.name: annotate-namespace
inputs.description: Annotate the target namespace. Ignored when annotate-resources is set to false or no namespace is provided.

inputs.name: private-cluster
inputs.description: True if cluster is AKS private cluster

inputs.name: resource-group
inputs.description: Name of resource group - Only required if using private cluster

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Name of the private cluster - Only required if using private cluster

inputs.name: skip-tls-verify
inputs.description: True if the insecure-skip-tls-verify option should be used. Input should be 'true' or 'false'.

inputs.name: resource-type
inputs.description: Either Microsoft.ContainerService/managedClusters or Microsoft.ContainerService/fleets'.
